package.name: Legizmo Jupiter
package.shortDescription: Enables pairing, connecting and updating to unsupported versions of watchOS.

descriptionlist.description: Legizmo Jupiter 3.2, compatible to iOS 13.0 - iOS 14.8

You can also have
a multi-line item.
